##Forum Analisis Statistik
###Clustering Report
###Tools: Fuzzy C-Means
***

Raw data before clustering:
```{r, echo=FALSE}
 hasilDataAwal()
```

Clustering result:
```{r, echo=FALSE}
 hasilCluster()
```

Cluster visualization:     
```{r plot, echo=FALSE}
 plotCM1()
 plotCM2()
 plotCM3()
```

The partition matrix:
```{r, echo=FALSE}
 hasilMatriksPartisi()
```

The center of clusters:
```{r, echo=FALSE}
 hasilPusatCluster()
```
